Name: Reflections Path
About the game: Every path has it's own story. Once followed, it can lead to many other amazing adventures. Mysterious energy fields have begun to appear and have caused changes to the world. There seems to be no explanation as to what the energy fields are, or why this is happening. Strange weather occurrences have also coincided with the appearances of the energy fields. Travel across various types of landscapes, such as foothills, forests and mountainous terrain, to find out the meaning of this phenomenon. With the help of the Sensory Scope, make your way through obstacles along the journey. Key Features : Adventure-filled story - Different types of map levels and places to travel through Map Level Design - Solve different puzzles to clear obstacles in a particular area, and navigate landscapes Turn-based fantasy RPG - Story and map areas complimented with classic turn-based RPG elements Controls : - Directional Arrows on Keyboard: Move character/ Navigate options and menu screen - Enter: Select options/ Action button - ESC: Cancel choice selection on menus - Shift: Access menu/ Exit menu on character screen
